title: Crafted Web
description: Mystery - Fiction TV Dinners, Douglas Edwards, and Beetle Bailey highlight this nostalgic, light-hearted yet dark mystery set in 1960 mid America.After his uncle's death, a young man from New York visits his cousin in Jenson Iowa, and together they investigate a tangled web. "Like when you take a deck of cards, and run your thumb across the edge, flipping the cards … you can still make some of the cards out – the red king, the black queen, some diamonds, hearts and spades."“It’s to die for.”-- Roberta Black
author: Bruce E. Martin
